description.@en: There is a ‘music’ that plays in your head whenever you practice the arts. Matching your brushstrokes, chisel or pen to the rhythm of the music, you create works of art that last not only a lifetime, but will gain acclaim long after you are long gone.

effect.@en:
Whenever you perform or create works of art, roll a 1D6 Chaos Die. If it lands on face ‘6’, you automatically
  Critically Succeed at the related Skill Test. Otherwise, you can attempt a Skill Test as usual. You must be Unharmed during the creative process to take
  advantage of this Trait.
